mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, HomeWin, Standoff, GuestWin, ModifyTime, isEarly
mapper.select: select sd.* from standard st,standarddetail sd where st.OddsID=sd.OddsID and st.ScheduleID = #{mid} and st.CompanyID = #{cpy} order by sd.ModifyTime desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into standarddetail (ID, OddsID, HomeWin, Standoff, GuestWin, ModifyTime, isEarly) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{homewin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{standoff,jdbcType=REAL}, #{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into standarddetail
ID,
OddsID,
HomeWin,
Standoff,
GuestWin,
ModifyTime,
isEarly,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{homewin,jdbcType=REAL},
#{standoff,jdbcType=REAL},
#{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
#{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update standarddetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HomeWin = #{homewin,jdbcType=REAL},
Standoff = #{standoff,jdbcType=REAL},
GuestWin = #{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update standarddetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HomeWin = #{homewin,jdbcType=REAL}, Standoff = #{standoff,jdbcType=REAL}, GuestWin = #{guestwin,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
